subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alessandro Petacchi of Italy won his second stage in the Giro d’Italia, but two American riders with the Garmin-Slipstream team fell, including Christian Vande Velde.
snippet: Alessandro Petacchi of Italy won his second stage in the Giro d’Italia, but two American riders with the Garmin-Slipstream team fell, including Christian Vande Velde.
